p: 🚀 Add a node based mega menu to your Neos website with ease and usability in mind
This package provides a way to add a mega menu to your Neos website.
It creates a childNode where menu items can be added. Submenu's can be created by adding menu items, and optionally labels and columns.
This package comes with a previewMode for easier editing the menu.
Add the package to your Site package.
Add the mixin UpAssist.MegaMenu:Mixin.Menu to your home page definition.
Next run the node repair command to create the proper childNode.
You can change the class name that is used as a base to override the default classes.
This menu is set up using Fusion AFX. If you want to override the implementation in your project, you are completely free to do so.
A handler component (to toggle the menu) is available as well: UpAsssist.MegaMenu:Component.Molecule.Menu.Handler. You can use this to set up toggling if you want.
